title: all: drop support for FreeBSD 7-STABLE from Go 1.2 and beyond
body:
Unfortunately Go 1.2 never works on FreeBSD 7 kernels (I've tried Go 1.2 on 7.4-p12?
last night, looks like TLS stuff crashes in build bootstrap go_bootstrap). Also 7-STABLE
branch has been EOL'd almost a year ago.

http://www.freebsd.org/releases/7.4R/announce.html
